# midiplayer-pro

This project is a Next.js application that reproduces the MidiPlayerJS demo interface and functionality using **Next.js 13 App Router**, **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind CSS**. It uses the **midi-player-js** library for MIDI file parsing/playback and **soundfont-player** for synthesizing MIDI audio.

## Setup and Running

1. **Install dependencies**:  
   ```bash
   npm install



npm run dev



---
